title: User Guide
content:
# Getting Started with Cognito Chatbot App

## Logging In
1. Navigate to the application URL
2. Enter your email address and password
3. Click the 'Sign In' button
4. If authentication is successful, you'll be redirected to your role-specific page

## Using the Chatbot (User Role)
Once logged in as a user, you can:
1. View the chatbot interface on your user page
2. Type your question in the input field
3. Press Enter or click Send
4. Wait for the AI to generate a response
5. View the answer in the chat history
6. Ask follow-up questions as needed

## Tips for Better Chatbot Responses
- Be specific with your questions
- Provide context when asking about technical topics
- Ask one question at a time for clearer answers
- If the answer isn't helpful, try rephrasing your question

## Admin Features (Admin Role)
If you have admin access, you can:
1. Access the admin dashboard
2. View system statistics
3. Monitor application usage
4. Manage user access (future feature)

## Troubleshooting

### Cannot Log In
- Verify your email and password are correct
- Check if your email is verified
- Contact your administrator if issues persist

### Chatbot Not Responding
- Check your internet connection
- Refresh the page and try again
- If the problem continues, contact support

### Access Denied Errors
- Verify you have the correct role assigned
- Log out and log back in
- Contact your administrator to verify your permissions

## Security Best Practices
- Use a strong, unique password
- Don't share your credentials
- Log out when finished using the application
- Report any suspicious activity to your administrator

## Support
For additional help or to report issues, contact your system administrator.
